nodes.documentation:
The TokenLock contract is designed to be a token vesting contract for synapses that a cortex
can use through voting in the FrontalLobe*
nodes.name: TokenLock

nodes.documentation: @notice onlyCortex is a modifier that prevents anyone but the cortex from calling a function
nodes.name: onlyCortex

nodes.documentation:
@notice the initialize function is fired only once during contract creation and is used to set up
the TokenLock contract to Its Cortex*
nodes.name: initialize

nodes.documentation: @notice connectNeuron is used to further set up a neuron*
nodes.name: connectNeuron
vestTokens

nodes.documentation:
@notice claimVestedTokens allows a end user to claim the vested tokens owed to the in an axon contract
@dev this function automagically distributes the appropriate amounts, no input params required!*
nodes.name: claimVestedTokens
calculateCyclesCompleted

nodes.documentation:
The TokenLock contract is designed to be a token vesting contract for synapses that a cortex
can use through voting in the FrontalLobe*
nodes.name: TokenLock

nodes.documentation: @notice onlyCortex is a modifier that prevents anyone but the cortex from calling a function

@notice the initialize function is fired only once during contract creation and is used to set up

vestTokens

nodes.documentation:
@notice claimVestedTokens allows a end user to claim the vested tokens owed to the in an axon contract
@dev this function automagically distributes the appropriate amounts, no input params required!*
nodes.name: claimVestedTokens
calculateCyclesCompleted

params._oneCycle: is the amount of time in seconds that one vesting release cycle is scheduled for*
params._time: is the amount of time the tokens have been vested

claimVestedTokens().details: this function automagically distributes the appropriate amounts, no input params required!*

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amountPerCycle: is the amount of token released to the beneficiary per cycle
params._beneficiary: is the beneficiary of the vesting
params._numberOfCycles: is the number of cycles for a certain beneficiary*
params._releaseCycleTime: is the time one release cycle takes to complete in seconds
params._token: is the ERC20 contract being vested
params._totalAmount: is the total amount of token alocated to the beneficiary

claimVestedTokens().notice: claimVestedTokens allows a end user to claim the vested tokens owed to the in an axon contract

connectNeuron(address).notice: connectNeuron is used to further set up a neuron*

initialize(address).notice: the initialize function is fired only once during contract creation and is used to set up the TokenLock contract to Its Cortex*

vestTokens(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: vestTokens allows a Cortex DAO to lock up an ERC20 token with a release cycle period for a beneficiary

userdoc.notice: The TokenLock contract is designed to be a token vesting contract for synapses that a cortex can use through voting in the FrontalLobe*
